item.title: Grails - Groovy - Alternative to HttpBuilder - adding headers to your HTTP request
item.description: Developing with Grails and Groovy can be a blessing and and pain all at the same time. The development moves at a rapid rate but when you decide to include libraries that depend on other libraries, your pain starts to build up. For example, when you include the module “HttpBuilder"in your project you may run into issues with Xerces and xml-apis, especially when you attempt to deploy the WAR file under Tomcat.
